Class knifeThrow.particles.particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • knifeThrow.tile
      • knifeThrow.particles.particle
  • Enclosing class:
    knifeThrow.particles

    static class knifeThrow.particles.particle
extends knifeThrow.tile
    This class manages the particle effects used in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean sb
      This subclass of tile class represents a single particle in the whole particle system.

        public particle(double x,
                double y,
                double w,

        This is the constructor of the particle class, containing the same arguments as the tile class.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the particle
        y - The y position of the particle
        w - The width of the particle
        h - The height of the partile

        update in class knifeThrow.tile
        Parameters:
